welcome_message_body: Welcome to Haverhill, where the historic charm meets vibrant culture! Get ready to explore our beautiful downtown, rich history, and scenic outdoor attractions. We hope you enjoy your time in our wonderful city!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lawrence Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Lawrence Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Beverly Municipal Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Beverly Municipal Airport is exclusively for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal and is free for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Boire Field Airport handles all commercial flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Boire Field Airport is used for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is exclusively for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The largest terminal at Logan International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Logan International Airport, primarily serving domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Logan International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal E
terminals.description: The international terminal at Logan International Airport, serving all international flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited coverage in certain areas.
